thread.title: BRIEF-Ioi Corporation Bhd Says Dec Production Of Palm Kernel 16,965 MT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ioi Corporation Bhd Says Dec Production Of Palm Kernel 16,965 MT

organizations.name: brief-ioi corporation bhd says dec production of palm kernel

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Ioi Corporation Bhd:
* DEC PRODUCTION OF PALM KERNEL 16,965 MT; DEC PRODUCTION OF RUBBER 69,843‍​ DRY KG
* ‍DEC OWN FFB PRODUCTION​ 335,736 M/TONNE; DEC CRUDE PALM OIL PRODUCTION​ 70,704 M/TONNE Source text :( bit.ly/2D40nFe ) Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
